## ScrollbarPair.setX() method

Set the handle of the horizontal scrollbar to be at a certain position in CSS pixels relative to its parents.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setX(x: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  x | number | Horizontal scroll value. |

**Returns:**

void
